mtl-crowd.title: MTL CROWD
mtl-crowd.description: Blockchain-based crowdfunding platform on Stellar. Transparency, security, and decentralization.

it-acceleration.title: IT ACCELERATION
it-acceleration.description: Acceleration program for IT professionals and their developments. Creating unified vision of tools, quality standards and order system. Issuing NUYEN token for Guild members.

sdf-integration.title: SDF INTEGRATION
sdf-integration.description: Integration with Stellar Development Foundation. Learning Stellar blockchain development, ecosystem participation, grant support for projects.
